dict.acceptation: 重要性；重要地位，显著；骄傲，自大；

sent.orig: Then, throwing back his shoulders, he said: "It is of no importance-no importance at all."
sent.trans: 接着他挺了挺胸脯说：“这无关紧要--一点也不要紧。”

sent.orig: The relationship-the human being-is then of secondary importance to you, or of no importance at all.
sent.trans: 关系（人类）对你来说就是次要的，或者就根本一点也不重要。

sent.orig: Food safety has attracted increasing attention due to its importance.
sent.trans: 食品安全问题引起了人们的普遍关注。

sent.orig: China attaches great importance to its relations with France.
sent.trans: 中国十分重视同法国的关系。

sent.orig: Graph theory methods have great importance in the field of prediction of protein structure.
sent.trans: 图论方法在蛋白质结构预测中占有重要地位。
